articles.title: My First Code Review
articles.description: My thoughts on doing my first code review. I learned a lot about the process and how to give constructive feedback.

articles.title: Re-useable Components
articles.description: A deep dive into the importance of re-usable components in web development. I discuss how they can save time and improve code quality.

articles.title: My thoughts on React
articles.description: A reflection on my journey with React. I share my experiences, challenges, and the joy of building dynamic web applications.
